string-array.name: Day1
string-array.item: 10:00 - 1:00 Processing workshop, Fun with science \n(phy and chem lab)
10:30 - 4:30 Theme Related Photography, Short Movie Making\n(Mech blk 3rd flr)

resources.string:
Enthral the audience with harmonious melodies and mellifluous voices… After all, Music is an outburst of the soul. 

Registration Fee : Rs.300
1st Prize : Rs.3000
2nd Prize : Rs.Rs.1500
Rationale : Team of 6
 

RULES: 
One entry per institution. 
Each team consists of 5 – 12 members (including the accompanists). 
Time limit: 6+1 minutes (singing) and 5 minutes (stage setup). 
Minimum of two vocals is compulsory. 
Original compositions are not allowed. 
Lyrics will be checked for vulgarity and profanity. 
Any pre-recorded music or sound will lead to disqualification of the team. 
Every extra minute taken beyond the time limit will lead to reduction of 5% of the total marks scored. 
Instruments required are to be brought by participating teams itself. \Teams will be judged based upon song selection and presentation.

A platform for all you Taylor Swifts and Adam Levines out there to belt it out! The more versatile you are the better chance you have of walking away with the prestigious title of Maaya Idol! Get the audiences rooting for you as you sing from one round to the other… 

Registration Fee : Rs.50
1st Prize : Rs.500
2nd Prize : Rs. 250
Rationale : Individual
 

RULES: 
Two entries per college. 
Hindi/English/Classical tracks only. 
Karaoke of the song should be brought in a CD/DVD or a pen drive in .cda or .mp3 format only. (Other formats may not be supported on the computer. Use them at your own risk) 
Versatility will fetch you more points! 
Original compositions are not allowed. 
Lyrics will be checked for vulgarity and profanity. 
Time limit of 2+1 minutes. 
Instruments required are to be brought by the participating team itself. 
Judgement will be based on the song selection and presentation.

Depict dance as it actually is - a divine form of art. Let the audience travel on a journey of philosophy, mythology and ethnicity, as you showcase the true culture of India. 

Registration Fee : Rs.400
1st Prize : Rs.4000
2nd Prize : Rs.2000
Rationale : Team of 8
 

RULES: 
 One entry per institution. 
Each team must have 8-10 participants. No lead dancer or solo performances are allowed at any point. 
Duration of dance: 6+1 minutes. 
The performance MUST be based on a contemporary theme. 
Usage of properties is allowed but it does not carry extra weightage. 
Pre-recorded music should be brought in a CD/DVD or a pen drive in .cda or .mp3 format only. (Other formats may not be supported on the computer. Use them at your own risk) 
Live music is not allowed. 
Any kind of fluid or flame is not allowed on stage. 
Vulgarity of any kind will lead to immediate disqualification.

Shabd aur sur se bante hain geet, inme ho pakke toh tumhari hai jeet! 

Registration Fee : Rs.150
1st Prize : Rs.1500
2nd Prize : Rs.750
Rationale : Team of 3
 

RULES: 
Each team must have three members. 
Preliminary written round. 
Final rounds will be announced on the day of the event.

Locking, popping, breaking and krumping ... bring it all together!! Improvise, socialise and encourage interaction and connect with spectators and the other dancers… Step up to the beat and bebop your way into the street! 

Registration Fee : Rs.300
1st Prize : Rs.3000
2nd Prize : Rs.1500
Rationale : Team of 8
 

RULES: 
One entry per institution. 
Four or up to ten participants in a team. 
Duration of dance: 7+1 minutes. 
Usage of props is allowed but it does not carry extra weightage. 
Pre-recorded music should be brought in a CD/DVD or a pen drive in .cda or .mp3 format only. (Other formats may not be supported on the computer. Use them at your own risk) 
Vulgarity of any kind will lead to immediate disqualification

We dance for laughter, we dance for tears, we dance for madness, we dance for fears, we dance for hopes, we dance for screams, we are the dancers, and we create the dreams. Every day brings you a chance to breathe, kick off your shoes and dance. So get together and burn the dance floor with breath-taking moves and get the audience rooting for you. 

Registration Fee : Rs.400
1st Prize : Rs.4000
2nd Prize : Rs.2000
Rationale : Team of 8
 

RULES: 
One entry per institution. 
Each team must have 8-10 participants. No lead dancer or solo performances are allowed at any point. 
Duration of dance: 7+1 minutes. 
Usage of props is allowed but it does not carry extra weightage. 
Pre-recorded music should be brought in a CD/DVD or a pen drive in .cda or .mp3 format only. (Other formats may not be supported on the computer. Use them at your own risk) Live music is not allowed. 
Vulgarity of any kind will lead to immediate disqualification.

A brilliant mash of flamboyance, style and attitude that will redefine fashion as you know it. We promise to set your hearts racing as glamorous models set the ramp on fire with their attitude and creative audacity! 

Registration Fee : Rs.350
1st Prize : Rs.3500
2nd Prize : Rs.1750
Rationale : Team of 8
 

RULES: 
Only one entry per college. 
Maximum of 12 participants per college. 
No skimpy/indecent clothing. 
Emphasis will be given to apparel, portrayal and originality. 
Time limit of 15 minutes, including an introduction of 2 minutes. Points will be reduced for exceeding the time limit. 
Teams must bring a cd with the soundtrack in .mp3 format

And hand in hand, on the edge of the sand, They danced by the light of the moon.-Edward Lear MJ might not be amongst us but he is present in everyone of you who dance with their hearts. Just dance your heart out and get the crowd behind you. 

Registration Fee : Rs.100
1st Prize : Rs.1000
2nd Prize : Rs.500
Rationale : Individual
 

RULES: 
Duration of dance:4+1 minutes. 
Usage of props is allowed but does not carry any extra weightage. 
Vulgarity of any kind will lead to immediate disqualification. 
Pre-recorded music should be brought in a CD/DVD or pen drive in .mp3 format only.(Other formats may not be supported on the computer. Use them at your own risk.) 
Live music is not allowed.

All you budding Peles out there, heres a chance to battle it out at the hottest 5a- side tournament in town. 

Registration Fee : Rs.350
1st Prize : Rs.3000
2nd Prize : Rs.1500
Rationale : Team of 5
 

RULES: 
Each team must have five players + three substitutes. 
Duration of game is 12 minutes. 
A player can get back to the field even after getting substituted. 
In case of a tie, winner is decided on the basis of a penalty shootout. 
A player can only score a goal once he crosses the half line.

Eat Shamelessly!!!!! Thats the motto here… 

Registration Fee : Rs.20
Prize : Gift Vouchers 
Rationale : Individual
 

RULES: 
Contestants have to eat each Golgappa with all the filling. 
Game time 5 minutes.

Is Cricket truly your religion? Heres a chance to find out! Come show your prowess in PESs own version of ‘Gully Cricket. 

Registration Fee : Rs.350
1st Prize : Rs.3000
2nd Prize : Rs.1500
Rationale : Team of 5
 

RULES: 
Each team must have five players. 
5 overs per team with each batsman getting a maximum of 1 over. 
A batsman is declared OUT if he manages to send the ball directly to the ropes. 
A bowler cannot bend his knees while bowling.

Registration Fee : Rs.150
1st Prize : Rs.1500
Rationale : Team of 3
 

RULES: 
Team of three+one. 
Duration of the game will be for 10min, 2 periods of 5 minutes. 
Half court. 
Standard rules of Basketball apply.
In case of a tie, go for a shoot out.

A platform for all you desi kalakaars out there to belt it out! 

Registration Fee : Rs.400
1st Prize : Rs.4000
2nd Prize : Rs.2000
Rationale : Team of 8
 

RULES: 
One entry per institution. 
Each team must have 8-10 participants. No lead dancer or solo performances allowed at any point. 
Duration of dance:7+1 minutes. 
Usage of props is allowed but it does not carry any extra weightage. 
Pre-recorded music should be brought in a CD/DVD or pen drive in .mp3 format only.(Other formats may not be supported on the computer. Use them at your own risk.) 
Live music is not allowed. 
Vulgarity of any kind will lead to immediate disqualification.

Registration Fee : Rs.100
1st Prize : Rs.1000
Rationale : Team of 2
 

RULES: 
Each team consists of two members. 
Three sets per game. 
Standard table tennis rules apply. 
The refree’s decision will be final.

Face painting is said to be a dream realized with a painters touch. Make the most of your canvas-the human face and paint something extraordinary. 

Registration Fee : Rs.50
1st Prize : Rs.500
2nd Prize : Rs.250
Rationale : Team of 2
 

RULES: 
Each team must consist of two members (1 artist, 1 canvas) Time limit: 1 hour. 
All materials are to be brought by the participants. 
No reference to material is allowed. 
Your deign can be large, medium or small, but it must fit on the face and not on the head, neck or other body part. 
You may include costumes, wigs, accessories, gemstones, glitter, feathers, silicon or prosthetics.

Collage is a natural for the acrylic medium... gels, matte medium as an adhesive, standard-body acrylics, fluid acrylics, acrylic gouache or watercolour, metallic and interference colours – anything can happen and usually does. So let the creative juices flow and watch a masterpiece unfold! 

Registration Fee : Rs.50
1st Prize : Rs.500
2nd Prize : Rs.250
Rationale : Team of 2
 

RULES: 
Each team has two members. 
Time limit: 1 hour. 
Theme will be given on the spot. 
Burning and use of scissors is forbidden. 
Chart paper will be provided. 
All other required materials are to be brought by the participants.

A portrait is made not in the camera but on the other side of it. All you shutterbugs out there, come over and click pictures based on the theme. 

Registration Fee : Rs.50
1st Prize : Rs.500
2nd Prize : Rs.250
Rationale : Individual
 

RULES: 
Maximum of two participants in a team. 
Teams must get themselves registered any time before commencement of the event, and must submit the entries before the deadline. 
Participants are required to bring their own digital cameras. Only digital cameras are allowed. 
Participants will be provided with computers with Windows OS and a USB port only. The cameras will be checked before the event begins. 
The memory card will be cleared and a back-up will be created before the event.

Bored of using the same old painting brush n doing the strokes? Try something new here. Use your fingers, scrubbers n al unwanted materials and bring out the uniqueness in ur art. 

Registration Fee : Rs.100
1st Prize : Rs.1000
2nd Prize : Rs.500
Rationale : Individual
 

RULES: 
Use any material other than paint brush. 
Bring your own colour materials n painting equipments. 
Duration – 1 hour 
This event is not theme related.

No flame, no fire… 
 Think you can cook a good meal by saving fuel? 
 Then here is a chance to cook a dish that will make other chefs go green… only with jealousy! 

Registration Fee : Rs.100
1st Prize : Rs.1000
2nd Prize : Rs.500
Rationale : Team of 3
 

RULES: 
Each team consists of maximum three participants. 
Each team has to prepare two items- one drink and one salad or dessert. 
Time limit: 90 minutes. 
Raw ingredients to be brought by the participants. 
Partially/Fully cooked materials are not allowed. 
No provision for stove/oven will be given. Use of flame is not allowed. 
No alcoholic items are allowed. 
Dishes have to be purely vegetarian. 
Participants will be judged based on taste and presentation. 
Consumption of supplies is not allowed. Tasting is allowed. 
Participants can bring any of these cutlery items - Spoons, 2 knives, glassware and crockery, forks, chopping board, straws, cake stand. 
Participants may also bring any of these raw materials - Fruits, fruit juices, vegetables, milk, sugar, chocolate bars, chocolate powder, tomato sauce, tabasco Sauce, curd, coffee, mayonnaise, vinegar, olive oil/sweet oil, salt, pepper, chilli powder, cream, food essence, ice, food colouring, fresh coriander, mint leaves, nuts, dessert wafers /biscuit (limited in plastic bags).

Do you see yourself calling the shots in the blockbusters of the future? Want to upstage the Steven Spielbergs and Karan Johars of filmdom? Then here’s a great place top reveal your filming expertise. 

Registration Fee : Rs.100
1st Prize : Rs.1000
2nd Prize : Rs.500
Rationale : Team of 3
 

RULES: 
Time limit – 15 minutes 
The director of the movie must be from the participating college. 
Any topic can be chosen to make the movie on. 
Vulgarity of any kind will lead to disqualification. 
Films may be in any language or have no dialogue at all.Foreign-language dialogue must have English subtitles.

This MAAYA, get ready to put all your resources and contacts to a test to fetch the most radical and extraordinary things in this epic race. The participants will be given a list of things that they have to fetch with specific points allocated for each. Everything is fair in this war. For once, you wont be ostracized for begging, despised for borrowing or prosecuted for stealing. The team which earns the maximum points in the least time will be declared the winners. 

Registration Fee : Rs.50
1st Prize : Gift Vouchers
Rationale : Team of 3
 

RULES: 
 A maximum of six participants per team. 
The team that gets the maximum points in the least possible time will be declared the winner.

Over the years, the Treasure Hunt has drawn immense footfall from everyone and it has never disappointed. The clues are anything between difficult and very difficult, ranging from anagrams to crypts, requiring pure general awareness as well as sheer mathematical aptitude! The fact that it is spread all over the campus makes it all the more exciting! Think you know your campus inside out? Think again! 

Registration Fee : Rs.50
Prize : Gift Vouchers
Rationale : Team of 2
 

RULES: 
 No limit on the number of team members. 
Teams are required to crack a series of clues before emerging the worthy winners. 
Each clue points to a landmark in the campus which is the source for their next clue. 
The first team to crack all the clues clinches the title. 
The team that cracks all the clues in the least possible time will be declared winners.

Floral print dresses might be the in-thing today. Can you get the same on the ground? Spread your colours, show your talent. 

Registration Fee : Rs.20
Prize : Gift Vouchers
Rationale : Individual
 

RULES: 
Maximum 3 in a team. 
Time allotted is 30 minutes only. 
Judges will decide the winner. 
Any misbehaviour or misconduct will lead to disqualification without any warning.

Crawl the web to find secret troves of knowledge, and unlock the next clue! Play Indiana Jones on the expanse of the Internet and WWW. 

Registration Fee : Rs.20
1Prize : Gift Vouchers
Rationale : Individual
 

RULES: 
It is an individual event. 
Each web page will contain certain clues, which will lead to the next page. 
The person who reaches the farthest in the shortest time will be the winner. 
Access to internet will be allowed.

Poke,Poke,Poke em all!!!! 
Have fun with numbers! 

Registration Fee : Rs.20
1Prize : Gift Vouchers
Rationale : Individual

How low can you go? Maaya features Limbo-The under Stick Dance. 

Registration Fee : Rs.20
Prize : Gift Vouchers
Rationale : Individual
 

RULES: 
 No skimpy clothing 
Touching the ground with any other body part apart from your legs will lead to disqualification.

How sharp is your aim? Put your skills of aiming to test. 

Registration Fee : Rs.20
Prize : Gift Vouchers 
Rationale : Individual
 

RULES: 
 Individual event. 
Just have a good aim. (:P)

A great event for all the movie buffs out there. From Simpsons to Breaking Bad, Godzilla to Shawshank Redemption we love everything. A quiz based on TV shows and movies. You dont wanna miss this!! 

Registration Fee : Rs.100
1st Prize : Rs.1000
2nd Prize : Rs.500
Rationale : Team of 2
 

RULES: 
Two members in a team. 
A preliminary round where 6 teams will be selected for the next round 
Three rounds for the 6 teams out of which two teams will win cash prize.

Have a different perception of everything? Put your Creativity to test by taking part in this contest where you can opine in writing for or against the theme. 

Registration Fee : Rs.50
1st Prize : Rs.500
2nd Prize : Rs.250
Rationale : Individual
 

 RULES: 
 Individual event

All the inventory required will be provided. 
Judgment will be based on the creativity, clarity of concept and style of writing . 
(Includes legibility, approach).

Motor mouths, meet your match! Manifest your mettle in a minute at Stiff Upper Lip. Speak fluently in flawless Queen’s English as long as you can. Buzz when your opponents’ slip up. Do you have it in you to become the ultimate JAM master??? Come and prove yourself. Motor mouths, meet your match! Manifest your mettle in a minute at Stiff Upper Lip. Speak fluently in flawless Queen’s English as long as you can. Buzz when your opponents’ slip up. Do you have it in you to become the ultimate JAM master??? Come and prove yourself. 

Registration Fee : Rs.50
1st Prize : Rs.500
2nd Prize : Rs.250
Rationale : Individual
 

RULES: 
Individual event 
Each participant is expected to speak clearly and fluently for a minute on a given topic. 
Only Queen’s English may be used. 
Other participants may ring the buzzer to point out errors in grammar, pauses, and use of slang, stammers, dramatization and deviation to gain control. The reason for ringing the buzzer has to be mentioned. +10 points for a valid objection. -5 points for an invalid one. 
The decision of the JAM master will be final. The participant will be judged based on spontaneity, wit, use of Queen’s English, any other criteria the JAM Master may deem suitable during the event.

How good are you in lecturing people and what is your power of knowledge? Here is a chance to prove it to the crowd. Enroll yourself for a verbal clash….THE DEBATE 

Registration Fee : Rs.100
1st Prize : Rs.1000
2nd Prize : Rs.500
Rationale : Team of 2
 

RULES: 
Each college is allowed to send a team of two speakers – one for and the other against the motion. 
Topics will be intimated to the teams one day prior to the event 
Each speaker is allowed 150 seconds to speak about the topic (either for or against) + 30 seconds of rebuttal (interjection). 
Exceeding the specified time may result in loss of points. 
Swearing and use of vulgar language will be penalized.

Advertise your own product in the wackiest way…! Its all about being catchy and entertaining! 

Registration Fee : Rs.350
1st Prize : Rs.3500
2nd Prize : Rs.1750
Rationale : Team of 8
 

RULES: 
Each team must consist of a maximum of ten members.

Time limit: 9+1 minutes (including stage setup and clearance). 
The languages allowed are English, Hindi and Kannada. 
Vulgarity of any kind will lead to disqualification.

Go from being Campus Hero/Heroine to being the superstar of Maaya ! Glide your way through quirky fun rounds, and your wit and charm could make you walk away with the coveted Mr Maaya and Miss. Maaya titles! 

Registration Fee : Rs.50
1st Prize : Rs.500
2nd Prize : Rs.500
Rationale : Individual
 

RULES: 
Individual Event. 
The participants have to crack the prelims and finals to win the Mr Maaya and Ms Maaya titles. 
The preliminary round will be a written one. 12 finalists will be selected. The rounds for the finals will be conducted by the judges.

You think you deserve to live from a crashing plane? Put yourself in a celebritys shoes and tell us why! Lets see how well you can convince the judges why you ought to be given the parachute! 

Registration Fee : Rs.50
1st Prize : Rs.500
2nd Prize : Rs.250
Rationale : Individual
 

RULES: 
Individual event. 
The participants are celebrities on a plane which is about to crash. The judges are the pilots. There is only one parachute left. Participants have to convince the judges about why they deserve the parachute. 
Vulgarity of any kind will lead to disqualification.

All songs say beautiful stories but what if you mixed them all together and threw in Godzilla? Diversity in perspective renders any object, however trivial, priceless. Going over to the funny side, we bring to you thematic spoofs, where participants are required to present a story based on songs. We take you to the world of recreating songs and revisiting events in satirical ways and with sarcastic, witty cracks, tickling the funny bones of all the insomniacs out there. 

Registration Fee : Rs.350
1st Prize : Rs.3500
2nd Prize : Rs.1750
Rationale : Team of 8
 

RULES: 
Maximum number of participants per entry is six on stage and two off stage. 
Teams have to present a story conveyed through songs. 
Time limit: 8-15 minutes on stage. Points will be deducted for vulgarity. 
No props will be provided. Teams may use props if they want, for which prior permission is necessary. 
Negative points for props usage without permission. 
Music if required must be given in mp3 format on a cd. 
Points will be awarded for creativity, humour, relevance to the theme and to the original content.

This game show exposes the ability of the players to cheat, lie and deceive in order to win lucrative prizes. 

Registration Fee : Rs.50
1st Prize : Rs.500
2nd Prize : Rs.250
Rationale : Individual
 

RULES: 
 
The game will have n( n to be decided later) contestants in which n-1 will be honest and one will be pre-designated as a Bluff Master. Nobody else, including the host, will know who the Bluff Master is. 
For each question, the players must come up with one of the r(around 5-10) most popular responses for that question. 
The Bluff Master can secretly see all the answers to the questions on the game show, thereby getting a huge edge over all the participants, without making any of the other player suspicious. 
The contestants will vote every round. If the Bluff Master gets exposed by voting, he will be out of the game and a new contestant will be made the Bluff Master randomly. 
Otherwise, the Bluff Master will vote out an honest player. 
The process will continue till only two contestants are left. 
In the last round, the audiences will be allowed to participate by voting for the person who they think is the Bluff Master(amongst the last 2 players). 
If the polling fails to spot the Bluff Master, he/she will take home the entire prize. If not, then the last honest player will get the prize. 
Apart from the winner, few of the top contestants voted out will be given prizes, directly related to their points obtained.

Maaya brings to you, right from the streets, the exchange of ideologies with drama, full of humour and zeal, Street Play aka Nukkad Natak, which is an endeavour carried out to propagate social and political messages among the masses amidst the direct, intimate and effective means of theatre by means of shouts, chants, songs in catchy tunes and drums. 

Registration Fee : Rs.300
1st Prize : Rs.3000
2nd Prize : Rs.1500
Rationale : Team of 8
 

RULES: 
 The play may be in English or Hindi or Kannada. 
Time limit of 20 minutes. 
Negative points for exceeding the time limit. 
An introduction of participants is necessary after the play. (not included in time limit) 
Points will be deducted for vulgarity. 
Use of mikes, lights and make-up is not allowed. 
Teams may use props of their own if they want, for which prior permission from the event co-ordinator is necessary. Negative points if used without permission. 
Teams must arrive at the venue 25 minutes before the event starts.

Actions speak louder than words. But how fast can you convey words just through actions? Find out when you are pitted against the others in this silent race to find the good word. 

Registration Fee : Rs.100
1st Prize : Rs.1000
2nd Prize : Rs.500
Rationale : Team of 3
 

RULES: 
Each team must consist of three members (including 1 actor). 
The actor is not allowed to talk or point at objects while acting. 
Splitting of words is NOT allowed. 
The actor is not allowed to show letters or numbers. The participants can use codes for the same.

There is nothing better than playing your buds one-on-one and one-upping them on the field. 
Nothing better, that is, except for FIFA tournaments! 
Bring out the passion you possess for your favourite teams onto the virtual field of FIFA 14 and unleash your dominance over fellow mates to be crowned the KING of Football! 

Registration Fee : Rs.100
1st Prize : Rs.1000
Rationale : Individual
 

RULES: 
Individual event. 
4 minutes per half. 
No use of special teams like International teams/World XI, etc. 
Decision of the organisers is binding.

Alright..Lets Move Out... Its fast, its violent… You need skill,speed, grit and will power.... Are you sure you can make it far? Prove it.… 

Registration Fee : Rs.400
1st Prize : Rs.4000
2nd Prize : Rs.2000
Rationale : Team of 5
 

RULES: 
Team size: 5 players 
Matches: Initial rounds: Race to 3. Semifinals: Race to 5 Finals: Race to 7 
Time limit: 2.5 minutes per round 
Starting money: 800 
Freeze time at the beginning of round: 10 seconds 
Buy time: 25 seconds 
No in-game bugs allowed 
Scroll-jump not allowed 
Map Pool: Initial Rounds: $1000$, aa_dima2 , 32_aztecworld,aim_headshot. 
Semifinals and Finals: de_dust2, de_nuke, de_inferno

Strategize and get the best combination of heroes to thrash the ancient of the other team. It does not matter if you are a DIRE or a RADIANT as long as the victory is yours. SO....ARE YOU READY TO DEFEND YOUR ANCIENT? 

Registration Fee : Rs.500
1st Prize : Rs.5000
2nd Prize : Rs.500
Rationale : Team of 5
 

RULES: 
Team of 5. 
Captains Mode only. 
Knockout rounds. 
Finals will be best of 3 if time permits, else will be only 1 game. 
Map: Latest. 
Each game will be of 30 mins only. 
At the end of 30 mins. the team having the highest score wins. 
If the scores are level at 30th minute, the team which gets the next kill wins.


Note: Semifinals and finals do not have time limit. Misconduct will lead to disqualification without warning.

All you guys out there, its time to fire up your engine and keep em revving because its one against all. Remember, there is no second place…If you aint first, you aint through! Think you are up for it? You are good enough to step up the heat? Then hop into your mean machine, step on the gas and let your ride roll! 

Registration Fee : Rs.100
1st Prize : Rs.1000
Rationale : Team of 3
 

RULES: 
No cheats 
No in-game glitches 
No shouting or arguing with organizers. 
Organizers and Coordinators decision is final.

Registration Fee : Rs.400
1st Prize : Rs.3000
2nd Prize : Rs.1500
Rationale : Team of 4
 

RULES: 
Modern Warfare 3 
Maps will be based on toss 
Time per round- 5 min 
Team deathmatch

Connect-IT is a game where the participants need to connect the given images and say the correct word for our query. 

Registration Fee : Rs.100
1st Prize : Rs.1000
2nd Prize : Rs.500
Rationale : Team of 2 

RULES: 
2 Participants in a Team. 
There are two rounds. 
Round 1: connect the images and give the correct answer 
Round 2: Event Rule will be given on spot. 
Additional Rules will be announced at the Event venue. 
Judges Decisions are Final. 
Event Duration: 
1 hour Event 
15 minutes Setting up 
15 minutes for making Decision.

It is an Online event , where the participant will be given the Snapshot of a website , in which the participant has to Identify the Website Address by using a search Engine. 

Registration Fee : Rs.100
1st Prize : Rs.1000
2nd Prize : Rs.500
Rationale : Team of 2
 

RULES: 
2 Participants in a Team. 
Participants can use any search Engine. 
Additional Rules will be announced at the Event venue. 
Judges Decisions are Final. 
Tools Provided:
Web browser:Mozilla Firefox
Image Clipping Tool 
Event Duration : 
30 minutes Event 
15 minutes Setting up 
15 minutes for making Decision.

Strip n Frame is a contest involving hands-on dismantling and assembling of an entire cycle which puts a test for the practical and technical skill of the contestants. Fastest team to strip down and assemble the entire cycle in the approved manner will be proclaimed as winner. 

Registration Fee : Rs.100
Rationale : Team of 3
 

 RULES: 
Not more than three contestants are allowed per team. 
Students irrespective of the department can take part in this contest. 
Tools required for assembling and dismantling will be provided. 
Additional tools bought by the contestants will not be allowed. 
Each team will be given a maximum time limit of 15mins. 
Points are awarded on the basis of time taken and appropriate assembly of the cycle. 
Participants should comply with the above mentioned rules. 
Teams violating any rules above mentioned will lead to direct expulsion from the contest.

The event has two parts. The first part is a workshop on how to use processing 2( a programming language for coders and visual artists). It will take about an hour. 

Registration Fee : Rs.100
1st Prize : Rs.1000
2nd Prize : Rs.500
Rationale : Individual


RULES: 
This will be a 2 hour event. 
There will be three questions. 
Each one harder than the previous one with difficulty level of beginner, intermediate and advanced. 
Based on the number of questions solved and the difficulty level of that question, the contestant will be awarded. 
Contestant should show their registration slip/receipt and college ID on the day of the workshop.

string.name: sandcasting
string.b: Being a Mech Engineer…. How curious are you to know the best way to manufacture a product? Here is a chance for you to train yourself by the industrial experts in sand casting.Get into the lab and to explore the ways to cast products..!

resources.string:
A platform for all you singers/non singers to who want to become Taylor Swifts and Adam Levines out there to belt it out! This workshop is designed keeping in mind the many people who just love to sing at office parties or other gatherings (and mostly film songs), though they have never had the opportunity or time to learn music formally.
This is an initiative to make learning singing easy and fun, like never before!
The main highlight of this workshop is that it provides on a platter the basics of traditional training and also tips and tricks of singing including voice culture, studio singing and other nuances of film singing, that are not taught usually in traditional music systems.
Also, the participant gets to record his or her voice in a high end studio, a truly unique experience for the bathroom singer!
The workshop is being conducted by Sunil Koshy, creator of India s first Audio Film, REBOOT. Sunil Koshy is a trained singer and techie, who has recorded with leading musicians like Keith Peters, Alwyn Fernandes, UstadFaiyaz Khan and top lyricists like JayantKaikini.
He has taken sabbaticals from working as a techie going in search of music gurus, and has learnt from some of the best gurus across the country. 

Registration Fee : Rs.200/300
Rationale : Individual


RULES: 
Hindi/English/Kannada/Tamil tracks only. 
Karaoke of the song should be brought in a CD/DVD or a pen drive in .mp3 format only. (Other formats may not be supported on the computer. Use them at your own risk) 
Both Individual and Group Entries allowed. 
No time limit 
A lot of prizes to be won!!!!

Discover the creativity and innovation in you! Your first step towards Artificial Intelligence!! Explore the world of robotics with Arduino. A 2-day hands on workshop designed for absolute beginners! Learn to build an autonomous robot that can navigate on a black line, avoid obstacles, follow the wall and avoid from falling off the edge! 

Registration Fee : Rs.3600
Rationale : Team of 3
 

 RULES: 
Pre-requisite : Basic C programming. 
Max of 3 in a team. 
Members of a team can be from different dept. or colleges. 
Every team should carry a laptop. 
Teams should show their registration slip/receipt and college ID on the day of the workshop.
